param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: POST
method.doc: To configure the runtime environment with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the runtime environment resource URI.

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: user_registry
param.doc: The type of user registry to be configured against. Valid values are local, ldap.

param.name: ldap_host
param.doc: The name of the LDAP server. This field is required unless user_registry is local.

param.name: ldap_port
param.doc: The port to be used when the system communicates with the LDAP server. This field is required unless user_registry is local.

param.name: ldap_dn
param.doc: The DN that is used when the system contacts the user registry. This field is required unless user_registry is local.

param.name: ldap_pwd
param.doc: The password for the DN. This field is required unless user_registry is local.

param.name: ldap_ssl_db
param.doc: The key file (no path information is required) that contains the certificate that is used to communicate with the user registry. If no keyfile is provided, the SSL is not used when the system communicates with the user registry. If SSL communication is required to the LDAP server, this field is required.

param.name: ldap_ssl_label
param.doc: The label of the SSL certificate that is used when the system communicates with the user registry. This option is only valid if the ldap_ssl_db option is provided. If SSL communication is required to the LDAP server, this field is optional. Otherwise this field is ignored.

param.name: ldap_suffix
param.doc: The LDAP suffix that is used to hold the Verify Identity Access secAuthority data. If the user_registry is ldap, this field is optional. Otherwise this field is ignored.

param.name: clean_ldap
param.doc: Whether any existing data within the LDAP server should be cleaned prior to the configuration. This field is only used if the user registry is local.

param.name: domain
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access domain name. This field is required unless user_registry is local.

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The security administrator's password (also known as sec_master).

param.name: admin_cert_lifetime
param.doc: The lifetime in days for the SSL server certificate.

param.name: ssl_compliance
param.doc: Specifies whether SSL is compliant with any additional computer security standard. Valid values are fips, sp800-131-transition, sp800-131-strict, suite-b-128, or suite-b-192.
